DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine effectiveness 4 different recruitment technique enrollment cholesterol study . 2,000 people meet initial eligibility criterion study randomize one 4 group receive recruitment letter invite participate study enrol online platform . Group 1 receive recruitment letter normal size envelope , Group 2 receive recruitment letter 8.5 x 11 inch envelope , Group 3 receive recruitment letter ship via USPS priority mail Group 4 receive recruitment letter image Amazon gift card tell receive $ 25 gift card enroll study . All group tell receive $ 25 check upon enrollment study .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Outreach Approaches Increase Enrollment Healthy Cholesterol Study
DOC.criteria: Diabetes history CVD LDL > = 130 mg/dl measure screen A prescription fill statin medication within last 12 month Medication Possession Ratio ( MPR ) < 80 % CVS Caremark Beneficiary Less 18 year old Contraindication statin use suffer side effect statin , myopathy Will give consent History active progressive liver disease abnormal liver function test baseline screen Currently participate another clinical trial relate aim Comorbidities likely lead death within shortperiod
